t: The Lord Will Care for Judah
Ask*pn the Lord*s for rain in the springtime; it*ld is the Lord*s who sends the thunderstorms. He*ln gives showers of rain to all people, and*ld plants of the field to everyone.

The*ln idols speak deceitfully, diviners*ld see visions that lie; they*ln tell dreams that are false, they*ld give comfort in vain. Therefore*ln the people wander like sheep oppressed*ld for lack of a shepherd.
“My*pn anger burns against the shepherds, and*ld I will punish the leaders; for*ln the Lord*s Almighty will care for*ld his flock, the people of Judah, and*ld make them like a proud horse in battle.
From*ln Judah will come the cornerstone, from*ld him the tent peg, from*ln him the battle bow, from*ld him every ruler.

Together*ln they will be like warriors in battle trampling*ld their enemy into the mud of the streets. They*ln will fight because the Lord*s is with them, and*ld they will put the enemy horsemen to shame.

“I*pn will strengthen Judah and*ld save the tribes of Joseph. I*ln will restore them because*ld I have compassion on them. They*ln will be as though I*ld had not rejected them, for*ln I am the Lord*s their God and*ld I will answer them.
The*ln Ephraimites will become like warriors, and*ld their hearts will be glad as with wine. Their*ln children will see it and be joyful; their*ld hearts will rejoice in the Lord.*s
I*ln will signal for them and*ld gather them in. Surely*ln I will redeem them; they*ld will be as numerous as before.
Though*ln I scatter them among the peoples, yet*ld in distant lands they will remember me. They*ln and their children will survive, and*ld they will return.
I*ln will bring them back from Egypt and*ld gather them from Assyria. I*ln will bring them to Gilead and Lebanon, and*ld there will not be room enough for them.

They*ln will pass through the sea of trouble; the*ld surging sea will be subdued and*ld all the depths of the Nile will dry up. Assyria’s*ln pride will be brought down and*ld Egypt’s scepter will pass away.
I*ln will strengthen them in the Lord*s and*ld in his name they will live securely,” declares*ld the Lord.*s
